languages.text: "Таково его предназначение. Быть надеждой, сломать оковы, прервать века мучений на этом корабле. Великая жертва ради великой цели". {n}Преподобный умолкает, испытующе глядя на Кибеллу.{/n} "Тебе должен быть знаком его путь. Вот только вместо сеятеля свободы тебя взрастили как меч палача".

"Such is his purpose: to be the hope, to break the shackles, to end the centuries of torment that have passed aboard this ship. A great sacrifice for a great cause." {n}He falls silent, looking at Kibellah expectantly.{/n} "You should be familiar with his ways, except that instead of a sower of freedom, you were raised to be an executioner's sword."
languages.original_text: "Таково его предназначение. Быть надеждой, сломать оковы, прервать века мучений на этом корабле. Великая жертва ради великой цели". {n}Преподобный умолкает, испытующе глядя на Кибеллу.{/n} "Тебе должен быть знаком его путь. Вот только вместо сеятеля свободы тебя взрастили как меч палача".

A great sacrifice for a great cause." {n}The Reverend falls silent, looking at Kibellah expectantly.{/n} "You should be familiar with his ways. Except that instead of a sower of freedom you were raised to be an executioner's sword."

A great sacrifice for a great cause." {n}He falls silent, looking at Kibellah expectantly.{/n} "You should be familiar with his ways, except that instead of a sower of freedom, you were raised to be an executioner's sword."

languages.text: "Das ist sein Ziel: die Hoffnung zu sein, die Ketten zu brechen, die jahrhundertelange Folter an Bord dieses Schiffes zu beenden. Ein großes Opfer für eine große Sache." {n}Er verstummt und blickt Kibellah erwartungsvoll an.{/n} "Ihr solltet seine Vorgehensweise kennen, nur dass Ihr keine Freiheit sät, sondern als Henkersschwert erzogen wurdet."
languages.original_text: "Such is his purpose: to be the hope, to break the shackles, to end the centuries of torment that have passed aboard this ship. A great sacrifice for a great cause." {n}He falls silent, looking at Kibellah expectantly.{/n} "You should be familiar with his ways, except that instead of a sower of freedom, you were raised to be an executioner's sword."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist sein Ziel: die Hoffnung zu sein, die Ketten zu brechen, die jahrhundertelange Folter an Bord dieses Schiffes zu beenden. Ein großes Opfer für eine große Sache." {n}Er verstummt und blickt Kibellah erwartungsvoll an.{/n} "Ihr solltet seine Vorgehensweise kennen, nur dass Ihr keine Freiheit sät, sondern als Henkersschwert erzogen wurdet."

languages.text: «Tal es su cometido: ser la esperanza, romper las cadenas, poner fin a los siglos de tormento que hemos sufrido a bordo de esta nave. Un noble sacrificio por una causa noble». {n}El confesor guarda silencio y mira a Kibellah, expectante.{/n} «Usted debería estar familiarizada con sus métodos, pero no la criaron para sembrar la semilla de la libertad, sino para empuñar la hoja del verdugo».
languages.original_text: "Such is his purpose: to be the hope, to break the shackles, to end the centuries of torment that have passed aboard this ship. A great sacrifice for a great cause." {n}He falls silent, looking at Kibellah expectantly.{/n} "You should be familiar with his ways, except that instead of a sower of freedom, you were raised to be an executioner's sword."

traits.locale_text: «Tal es su cometido: ser la esperanza, romper las cadenas, poner fin a los siglos de tormento que hemos sufrido a bordo de esta nave. Un noble sacrificio por una causa noble». {n}El confesor guarda silencio y mira a Kibellah, expectante.{/n} «Usted debería estar familiarizada con sus métodos, pero no la criaron para sembrar la semilla de la libertad, sino para empuñar la hoja del verdugo».

languages.text: 「彼の目的は、希望となり、束縛を解き、この船で何世紀も続いた苦しみを終わらせること。偉大な目的のための偉大な犠牲だよ」{n}男は黙り込み、期待の眼差しでキベラを見つめている。{/n}「君は彼のやり方をよく分かってるはずだ。ただし、自由の種をまく代わりに、あなたは処刑人の剣になるように育てられた」
languages.original_text: "Such is his purpose: to be the hope, to break the shackles, to end the centuries of torment that have passed aboard this ship. A great sacrifice for a great cause." {n}He falls silent, looking at Kibellah expectantly.{/n} "You should be familiar with his ways, except that instead of a sower of freedom, you were raised to be an executioner's sword."

traits.locale_text: 「彼の目的は、希望となり、束縛を解き、この船で何世紀も続いた苦しみを終わらせること。偉大な目的のための偉大な犠牲だよ」{n}男は黙り込み、期待の眼差しでキベラを見つめている。{/n}「君は彼のやり方をよく分かってるはずだ。ただし、自由の種をまく代わりに、あなたは処刑人の剣になるように育てられた」

languages.text: “而这就是他的目标——打破枷锁，结束这艘船上长达数百年之久的折磨。这是为伟大事业付出的伟大牺牲。”{n}他沉默下来，以期待的目光看着绮贝菈。{/n}“你应该很熟悉他的生活方式。你们唯一的区别在于：你并不是自由的播种者，而是屠夫手中的利刃。”
languages.original_text: "Such is his purpose: to be the hope, to break the shackles, to end the centuries of torment that have passed aboard this ship. A great sacrifice for a great cause." {n}He falls silent, looking at Kibellah expectantly.{/n} "You should be familiar with his ways, except that instead of a sower of freedom, you were raised to be an executioner's sword."

traits.locale_text: “而这就是他的目标——打破枷锁，结束这艘船上长达数百年之久的折磨。这是为伟大事业付出的伟大牺牲。”{n}他沉默下来，以期待的目光看着绮贝菈。{/n}“你应该很熟悉他的生活方式。你们唯一的区别在于：你并不是自由的播种者，而是屠夫手中的利刃。”

languages.text: « Telle est sa raison d'être : incarner l'espoir, briser les chaînes et mettre fin aux longs siècles de sévices dont ce vaisseau a été témoin. Un grand sacrifice pour une cause qui l'est tout autant. » {n}Il se tait et regarde Kibellah, dans l'expectative.{/n} « Vous devriez pourtant savoir de quoi je parle... La seule différence entre vous, c'est que vous avez été élevée comme une semeuse de mort et lui comme un semeur de liberté. »
languages.original_text: "Such is his purpose: to be the hope, to break the shackles, to end the centuries of torment that have passed aboard this ship. A great sacrifice for a great cause." {n}He falls silent, looking at Kibellah expectantly.{/n} "You should be familiar with his ways, except that instead of a sower of freedom, you were raised to be an executioner's sword."

traits.locale_text: « Telle est sa raison d'être : incarner l'espoir, briser les chaînes et mettre fin aux longs siècles de sévices dont ce vaisseau a été témoin. La seule différence entre vous, c'est que vous avez été élevée comme une semeuse de mort et lui comme un semeur de liberté. »

languages.text: "Onun amacı bu: Umut olmak, zincirleri kırmak, bu gemide yüzyıllardır süren ve nesilden nesle aktarılan ızdırabı sonlandırmak. Ulu bir amaç uğruna ulu bir fedakârlık." {n}Sessizliğe gömülüyor, beklentiyle Kibellah'ya bakıyor.{/n} "Onun yöntemlerine aşina olmalısın. Ancak adalet yaymak yerine bir celladın kılıcı olmak üzere yetiştirildin."
languages.original_text: "Such is his purpose: to be the hope, to break the shackles, to end the centuries of torment that have passed aboard this ship. A great sacrifice for a great cause." {n}He falls silent, looking at Kibellah expectantly.{/n} "You should be familiar with his ways, except that instead of a sower of freedom, you were raised to be an executioner's sword."
